verbs.description: [V: slow] [ARG1: cooker beef vegetable] stew come home to warm comfort food this beef stew is based on my mom wonderful recipe but i adjusted it for the slow cooker add a sprinkle of parmesan to each bowl for a nice finishing touch —marcella west washburn illinois
